name: The Secret Society (itch)
description:
The Secret Society is a visual novel made in less than a month, for the NaNoRenO game jam.

Story

One day, you receive an invitation to a mysterious gathering at the Argent Manor. Recognizing the opportunity to find your childhood friend, who accepted a similar invitation years ago and never returned, you set out on a rescue mission. However, what you find at the mansion turns out to be far beyond what you could have imagined. What supernatural secrets are waiting to be uncovered?

Protagonist Love interests Features
  • Protagonist with customizable name and physique
  • A childhood friend who mysteriously disappeared several years ago
  • A lord with grand ambitions and captivating charm
  • Linear story diverging into two unique paths of romantic nature
  • Over 15 000 words, approximately 1,5–2h playtime
Upcoming features

These features are yet to be implemented in the visual novel. Look forward to them in an upcoming update!

  • A number of beautiful CGs and collectable illustrations
  • Additional endings and choices throughout the story
  • Customized text box and choice menu
  • Epilogues and other bonus content
Thank you for reading!
